thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com | 7 of 183
thread.title: Vicky

author: Vicky
title: Vicky
text: I first called about a wig that was out of stock and was told how to be alerted when it became available. Customer service spoke English and was able to service me. I placed the order once it was it available. All confirmation were on same day well as shipping. I received the wig in about 3 days. The wig was in great condition and I really love it. I will now be ordering with Elevate Styles.
